text: Ganapathipillai Gangaser Ponnambalam (; 8 November 1901 â€“ 9 February 1977), also known as G. G. Ponnambalam, was a Sri Lankan Tamil politician, during the British colonial period and the war for independence. He founded the first Sri Lankan Tamil political party, the All Ceylon Tamil Congress. Category:1901 births Category:Sri Lankan politicians Category:Tamil activists
title: G. G. Ponnambalam
